channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Livemesh Addons for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Livemesh Addons for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2021-24260|2024-08-03T19:28:22.726Z -- unknown -- livemesh%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The “Livemesh Addons for Elementor” WordPress Plugin before 6.8 has several widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.

item.title: CVE-2022-3862|2024-08-03T01:20:58.779Z -- unknown -- livemesh%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Livemesh Addons for Elementor WordPress plugin before 7.2.4 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
